oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Overdubbed Hank Williams Mother's Best #1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Unreleased edited excerpts of overdubbed recordings of performances from Hank Williams Mother's Best Flour Shows. Original recordings made in 1951.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cherokee Boogie -- If I Didn't Love You -- Next Sunday Darling Is My Birthday -- Blue Eyes Crying In The Rain -- Where The Old Red River Flows -- Alabama Waltz -- Just When I Needed You -- I'll Sail My Ship Alone -- Deck Of Cards -- There's Nothing As Sweet As My Baby -- Mothers Best Flour Commercial -- Lonely Tomb -- Steal Away (The Funeral) -- Softly And Tenderly -- Lord Build Me A Cabin In The Corner Of Gloryland -- I Heard My Savior Calling Me -- Where He Leads Me (I Can Hear My Savior Calling) -- On Top Of Old Smokey -- I Can't Tell My Heart That -- Tennessee Border -- Gathering Flowers For The Masters Bouquet -- All I Do Is Hang My Head And Cry -- Low And Lonely -- Seaman's Blues -- Pins And Needles (In My Heart) -- Thirty Pieces Of Silver -- The Blind Child -- Farther Along -- When God Dips His Love In My Heart -- Previously Recorded Content -- The Prodigal Son -- Take My Hand Precious Lord -- I'll Fly Away -- A Beautiful Home -- I Dreamed That The Great Judgement Morning -- From Jerusalem To Jericho -- I've Got My One Way Ticket To The Sky -- Searching For A Soldiers Grave.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953;
